quote: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
name: Matsuo Basho

quote: Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
name: George A. Moore

quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
name: Jane Austen

quote: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home.
name: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: The ache for home lives in all of us, the safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
name: Confucius

quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
name: Billy Graham

quote: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: If you go anywhere, even paradise, you will miss your home.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Turn up the lights. I don't want to go home in the dark.
name: O. Henry

quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Like love, breakfast is best when made at home.
name: Gina Barreca

quote: My parents said that sitting at home playing video games all day won't bring you anywhere in life.
name: PewDiePie

quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history.
name: Debi Mazar

quote: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
name: Elmer Davis

quote: My home is in Heaven. I'm just traveling through this world.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Christmas... is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart.
name: Freya Stark

quote: I love coming back home and seeing old friends and family. I would say it keeps me grounded.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: Furniture should always be comfortable. And always have a piece of art that you made somewhere in the home.
name: Tamara Taylor

quote: Charity begins at home, and justice begins next door.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: The prospect of going home is very appealing.
name: David Ginola

quote: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
name: William Morris

quote: It felt good doing a physical job, and going home each evening feeling like I had really done a day's work.
name: James D'arcy

quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
name: Jennifer Ellison

quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: I love cats because I enjoy my home; and little by little, they become its visible soul.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: Your body is your temple, it's your home, and you must decorate it.
name: Gabourey Sidibe

quote: Christmas is, of course, the time to be home - in heart as well as body.
name: Garry Moore

quote: I am not going to die, I'm going home like a shooting star.
name: Sojourner Truth

quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.
name: John Lasseter

quote: An artist has no home in Europe except in Paris.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The thrill of coming home has never changed.
name: Guy Pearce

quote: Opening up your life to a dog who needs a home is one of the most fulfilling things you can do.
name: Emma Kenney

quote: My wife met me at the door the other night in a sexy negligee. Unfortunately, she was just coming home.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: My restless, roaming spirit would not allow me to remain at home very long.
name: Buffalo Bill

quote: We share one heart, one home, and one glorious destiny.
name: Donald Trump

quote: A home without books is a body without soul.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: When I'm home, I like a cozy, comfortable, calming space.
name: Stacy Keibler

quote: Home ownership is the cornerstone of a strong community.
name: Rick Renzi

quote: Seeing a catering truck feels like home.
name: Dakota Johnson

quote: As soon as I get home, all I want to eat is seafood.
name: Quvenzhane Wallis

quote: The great advantage of a hotel is that it is a refuge from home life.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Home is where you feel at home and are treated well.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: Every dog is a lion at home.
name: Henry George Bohn

quote: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: I never worry about being driven to drink; I just worry about being driven home.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: You come home, and you party. But after that, you get a hangover. Everything about that is negative.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed; it just feels like you are home when you are in it.
name: Ashton Kutcher

quote: Ten men waiting for me at the door? Send one of them home, I'm tired.
name: Mae West

quote: The home should be the treasure chest of living.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Charity begins at home, but should not end there.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: I love my living room: it's the heart of my home where I get to chill and spend time with family and friends.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: A girl phoned me the other day and said... 'Come on over, there's nobody home.' I went over. Nobody was home.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I enjoy spending time at home or going out for a quiet meal in a restaurant.
name: Jamie Redknapp

quote: Not one of us can rest, be happy, be at home, be at peace with ourselves, until we end hatred and division.
name: John Lewis

quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Well, you need the villain. If you don't have a villain, the good guy can stay home.
name: Christoph Waltz

quote: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Every time I slip into the ocean, it's like going home.
name: Sylvia Earle

quote: When you live on the road, going home is a place to escape and just be with your family to unwind.
name: Jonathan Davis

quote: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Be nice to your children. After all, they are going to choose your nursing home.
name: Steven Wright

quote: All I do is sit at home and watch Netflix.
name: Kyrie Irving

quote: Theatre was my first love. I can't take the theatre out of me. And I wouldn't want to. To me, it's home.
name: Jim Parsons

quote: Better do a good deed near at home than go far away to burn incense.
name: Amelia Earhart

quote: I love traveling all over the world; but it's true: there's nothing like home.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: I'm really quite simple. I plant flowers and watch them grow... I stay at home and watch the river flow.
name: George Harrison

quote: Think you're escaping and run into yourself. Longest way round is the shortest way home.
name: James Joyce

quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
name: Meagan Good

quote: Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Maybe I should just go home and ride my tractor.
name: Chuck Grassley

quote: The means of defense against foreign danger historically have become the instruments of tyranny at home.
name: James Madison

quote: Whether you come back by page or by the big screen, Hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Boston is always going to be a second home for me.
name: Paul Pierce

quote: Life doesn't get more real than having a newborn at home.
name: Eric Church

quote: 'Butterfly Mosque' came out of the emails I wrote to family and friends back home after moving to Egypt.
name: G. Willow Wilson

quote: God is at home, it's we who have gone out for a walk.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Why would I retire? Sit at home and watch TV? No thanks. I'd rather be out playing.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: One never reaches home, but wherever friendly paths intersect the whole world looks like home for a time.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: Censorship, like charity, should begin at home, but, unlike charity, it should end there.
name: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: I feel most at home in the water. I disappear. That's where I belong.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Travelling's so much better when you know you've got a lovely home to go back to.
name: Toni Collette

quote: When everyone goes home, you're stuck with yourself.
name: Layne Staley

quote: You don't have to swing hard to hit a home run. If you got the timing, it'll go.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: I love modeling because I get to see everything that inspires me. Then I go home and sketch.
name: Sofia Richie

quote: The most influential of all educational factors is the conversation in a child's home.
name: William Temple

quote: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: When memories fade, can one ever really return home?
name: Floyd Skloot

quote: Home is the nicest word there is.
name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: Home is where one starts from.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Going home must be like going to render an account.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: Unraveling external selves and coming home to our real identity is the true meaning of soul work.
name: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: I was hit by a car once on my bike, but I still rode home.
name: Amy Winehouse

quote: Africa for the Africans... at home and abroad!
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: I followed a guy to Denmark. I came home with a broken heart.
name: Elle King

quote: A house that does not have one warm, comfy chair in it is soulless.
name: May Sarton

quote: Quality of life actually begins at home - it's in your street, around your community.
name: Charles Kennedy

quote: Where thou art, that is home.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Home is one's birthplace, ratified by memory.
name: Henry Grunwald

quote: Just because I managed to do a little something, I don't want anyone back home to think I got the big head.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: Nature is the mother and the habitat of man, even if sometimes a stepmother and an unfriendly home.
name: John Dewey

quote: Going home helps the content.
name: The Weeknd

quote: When I want to really eat great, I eat at home when my wife cooks.
name: Sirio Maccioni

quote: Be grateful for the home you have, knowing that at this moment, all you have is all you need.
name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: A house is no home unless it contain food and fire for the mind as well as for the body.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: The roof of my house is covered in solar panels. When I'm home, I'm a pretty green fellow.
name: Bill McKibben

quote: Home is, I suppose just a child's idea. A house at night, and a lamp in the house. A place to feel safe.
name: V. S. Naipaul

quote: Coming home to a tidy, pulled-together space will help everything in your life feel the same way.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: If your neighbors think you're a detective because a cop always brings you home, you might be a redneck.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Greatness comes from fear. Fear can either shut us down and we go home, or we fight through it.
name: Lionel Richie

quote: The Patriot Act is essential to our continued success in the war on terror here at home.
name: Mike Pence

quote: When I am back home, I have an upright piano and I play constantly.
name: Kygo

quote: A man's home is his wife's castle.
name: Alexander Chase

quote: At home, I love reaching out into that absolute silence, when you can hear the owl or the wind.
name: Amanda Harlech

quote: Call me a nerd if you like, but I do find it hard to leave home without my laptop and a good book.
name: Moby

quote: Education, like neurosis, begins at home.
name: Milton Sapirstein

quote: Any old place I can hang my hat is home sweet home to me.
name: William Jerome

quote: Home is where the heart is.
name: Pliny the Elder

quote: I told my mother-in-law that my house was her house, and she said, 'Get the hell off my property.'
name: Joan Rivers

quote: I have way too many candles. There's always a candle burning at home.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: Homesickness is nothing. Fifty percent of the people in the world are homesick all the time.
name: John Cheever

quote: I do feel like a Clevelander. Every time, when people ask me, I automatically say, 'My home is Cleveland.'
name: Kyrie Irving

quote: I have a necklace around my neck that my lady gave me, so I try never to leave home without that.
name: Chad Michael Murray

quote: A heart makes a good home for the friend.
name: Yunus Emre

quote: I go jogging for 25 minutes every morning, even if I'm away from home.
name: Pierre Dukan

quote: Here is my first principle of foreign policy: good government at home.
name: William E. Gladstone

quote: A Christian worldview impacts every area of life. Including making your house a home.
name: Eric Metaxas

quote: My home policy: I wage war; my foreign policy: I wage war. All the time I wage war.
name: Georges Clemenceau

quote: For more than a quarter of a century on active duty, my house has been my tent, and my home the battlefield.
name: Zachary Taylor

quote: When you finally go back to your old home, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
name: Sam Ewing

quote: I never really had the fun teens of exploring the world because I was sitting at home, learning programming.
name: Markus Persson

quote: If nature offers no home, then we must make a home one way or another. The only question is how.
name: John Burnside

quote: Baseball is like driving, it's the one who gets home safely that counts.
name: Tommy Lasorda

quote: I have an answering machine in my car. It says, I'm home now. But leave a message and I'll call when I'm out.
name: Steven Wright

quote: There are a thousand ways to kneel and kiss the ground; there are a thousand ways to go home again.
name: Rumi

quote: Balance provides the chance for longevity. You can be a champion at work and at home.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: At home I am a nice guy: but I don't want the world to know. Humble people, I've found, don't get very far.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: I suppose I could have stayed home and baked cookies and had teas.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Shall I, that have destroyed my Preservers, return home?
name: Alexander the Great

quote: The goal of Sunday is to leave my home as little as possible.
name: Mark Morris

quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I think home has become my friends and family, wherever they are.
name: Rachel Brosnahan

quote: All good hotels tend to lead people to do things they wouldn't necessarily do at home.
name: Andre Balazs

quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: I had a lot of dates but I decided to stay home and dye my eyebrows.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: I'm more at home with my log cabins than I am in my house in Cherry Hill.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Home life is no more natural to us than a cage is natural to a cockatoo.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I really enjoy spending time at home.
name: Elena Roger

quote: A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I chose America as my home because I value freedom and democracy, civil liberties and an open society.
name: George Soros

quote: I have become a queer mixture of the East and the West, out of place everywhere, at home nowhere.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Toronto is home; nothing beats home.
name: Ellen Wong

quote: Prayer is the most concrete way to make our home in God.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: There are a number of things wrong with Washington. One of them is that everyone is too far from home.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Nothing is better than showing up twice a week, acting like a 12 year-old for two hours, and then going home.
name: Reid Scott

quote: I hate leaving home. I love what I do, but I'd love to go home every night.
name: Charlie Watts

quote: I had bad days on the field. But I didn't take them home with me. I left them in a bar along the way home.
name: Bob Lemon

quote: I love the road. The closest thing to home, for me, is being on a tour bus, ironically.
name: G-Eazy

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: When I went home from Juilliard, I couldn't find acting work.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Knitting not only relaxes me, it also brings a feeling of being at home.
name: Magdalena Neuner

quote: Just take the ball and throw it where you want to. Throw strikes. Home plate don't move.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: To be an ideal guest, stay at home.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: Coming home to my family afterward makes the work richer, easier and more fun.
name: Edie Falco

quote: I'm happy going home early and working out and just being a mother and being a wife.
name: Kim Alexis

quote: Leaving home in a sense involves a kind of second birth in which we give birth to ourselves.
name: Robert Neelly Bellah

quote: On stage I make love to twenty five thousand people; and then I go home alone.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: I wish I had been home more when the children were growing up. I missed a lot.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I'm very political. I'm not political in public; I'm political at home.
name: Melania Trump

quote: I just like sitting at home, chilling and watching a movie.
name: Niall Horan

quote: Pennsylvania is home to some of the hardest-working, toughest, most decent people in America.
name: Bob Casey, Jr.

quote: The silver and black may have another home, but the Raiders will always belong to the people of Los Angeles.
name: Ice Cube

quote: There's no place like home. And I do miss my home.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: I can remember being home from school with tonsillitis and writing stories in bed to pass the time.
name: Stephen King

quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them.
name: Gabriel Marcel

quote: Once I am in the square circle, I am in my home.
name: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: When I do have free time, I spend it with friends, or I spend it at home writing or making something.
name: Billie Eilish

quote: Everywhere else, we are someone else, but at home, we remove our masks.
name: Matthew Desmond

quote: Most of American life consists of driving somewhere and then returning home, wondering why the hell you went.
name: John Updike

quote: My goal from being a child was to have a happy home life.
name: S. E. Hinton

quote: Be good to people, be kind to people, show up, read the lines, hit the mark, and go home.
name: Pierce Brosnan

quote: As a political exile, you always think you're going home next year.
name: Gonzalo Sanchez de Lozada

quote: I'm kind of a homebody. I like to sit at home and watch movies and eat good food.
name: Emilie de Ravin

quote: This is my idea of heaven, coming home and watching the news.
name: Rita Moreno

quote: While I encourage people to save 100% down for a home, a mortgage is the one debt that I don't frown upon.
name: Dave Ramsey

quote: Maria is the best reason to come home.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Go to foreign countries and you will get to know the good things one possesses at home.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I love my family, my wife, my kids, my dogs, my home, my life. I am a very happy and contented man.
name: Eric Idle

quote: You see much more of your children once they leave home.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: I also believed that our public at home would be strong enough to survive even the present crisis.
name: Paul von Hindenburg

quote: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace.
name: Silvia Cartwright

quote: Charity should begin at home, but should not stay there.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: I believe the home and marriage is the foundation of our society and must be protected.
name: Billy Graham

quote: There is nothing more important than a good, safe, secure home.
name: Rosalynn Carter

quote: I train and I go home, and when I'm home, I think about training. That's my life every day, and that's it.
name: Conor McGregor

quote: It's quite nice to have a place to leave things. You can be a permanent gypsy, but it's nice to go home.
name: Daphne Guinness

quote: Whenever I'm having a bad day and have an attitude, I stay home. I keep it at home.
name: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: After a really hectic week, I hate going out on a Friday evening, so I'll always opt for a night at home.
name: Donna Air

quote: My dad never missed a day of work, and he was always smiling when he came home.
name: Patty Loveless

quote: I do not recall a Jewish home without a book on the table.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: In an ideal world, I'm eating dinner at home before I have a DJ gig.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: I'm not someone who's led my life trying to get publicity; I'd rather do my work and go home.
name: Kevin Spacey

quote: In our home there was always prayer - aloud, proud and unapologetic.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: I don't even know how it is to have a home. I feel like an orphan or something.
name: Fred Korematsu

quote: I was not up stairs when he came home; no, sir.
name: Lizzie Andrew Borden

quote: My label understands that I am really attached to Malaysia, that I come home a lot.
name: Yuna

quote: Owning a home is a keystone of wealth - both financial affluence and emotional security.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Everywhere you hang your hat is home. Home is the bright cave under the hat.
name: Lance Morrow

quote: Everybody thinks I'm, like, a bad boy. I've had my day, but I just sit at home and play the blues mostly.
name: Brad Renfro

quote: On stage, I make love to 25,000 different people, then I go home alone.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss; volatile spirits prefer unhappiness.
name: George Santayana

quote: I just try to make my home everywhere I go as much as I possibly can.
name: Selena Gomez

quote: The world is my workshop. It is not my home.
name: Abbas Kiarostami

quote: If a really, really pretty girl needs a ride home, I'm your guy.
name: Brantley Gilbert

quote: I escaped from my home country, Bulgaria, to Czechoslovakia and then to the West.
name: Christo

quote: I am an academic, and I have always made it clear that my ultimate home is in the realm of ideas.
name: Raghuram Rajan

quote: I love the Old Vic so deeply, it's like a second home.
name: Eve Best

quote: You hit home runs not by chance but by preparation.
name: Roger Maris

quote: All philosophies, if you ride them home, are nonsense, but some are greater nonsense than others.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Donald Trump will never turn his back on those who serve and protect us at home and abroad.
name: Mike Pence

quote: I have lived in Mumbai for more than 20 years, have my domicile here, my home and family here.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: It takes a good amount of time and money to establish a home. Eviction can erase all that.
name: Matthew Desmond

quote: Seek home for rest, for home is best.
name: Thomas Tusser

quote: The home is the chief school of human virtues.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: Pitching keeps you in the games. Home runs win the game.
name: Earl Weaver

quote: I would go to work from 9 to 6, go home, nap for two hours, then write from 8 to 2 a.m.
name: Lena Dunham

quote: I'm not the pedigree kid. I'm not classically trained. I didn't come from the fancy home, no.
name: Kate Winslet

quote: Housework is what a woman does that nobody notices unless she hasn't done it.
name: Evan Esar

quote: It's intimidating to try and pull your home together if you don't have an interior designer.
name: Jaclyn Smith

quote: A man's house is his castle.
name: James Otis

quote: I love to come to L.A. to visit, and then I like to come to rainy old London because it's home.
name: Daisy Ridley

quote: I cook all the time, and I cook all different kinds of things, but never Mexican at home. That's my work.
name: Rick Bayless

quote: If you're not in the game, you can't hit a home run.
name: David Hasselhoff

quote: Housewives run the home and sacrifice a lot, but many people forget that.
name: Arjun Kapoor

quote: Sometimes, I'll be flipping the channel at home and think, 'Wow, there's a lot of me on TV.'
name: Lester Holt

quote: Kiss till the cow comes home.
name: Francis Beaumont

quote: Kindness goes a long ways lots of times when it ought to stay at home.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: It helps to have a happy home life to keep up alongside your career.
name: Mary Berry

quote: The worst feeling in the world is the homesickness that comes over a man occasionally when he is at home.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: In my mind, the home run is paramount because it means instant runs.
name: Earl Weaver

quote: Where there is a mother in the home, matters go well.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Home, more than anything, means warmth and bed.
name: Vivienne Westwood

quote: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
name: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: On tour, you never have a home, you don't get used to anything, and you're always super busy.
name: Travis Barker

quote: In the mind, in the heart, I was always home. I always imagined, really, going back home.
name: Miriam Makeba

quote: I find home renovations almost traumatic. But people can create something great.
name: Ginger Zee

quote: My dream home would be a fishing lodge in New Zealand.
name: John Rocha

quote: My house feels like a proper home. It's very relaxed with a hippyish vibe.
name: Cat Deeley

quote: My home is in West Vancouver, B.C. My husband built it from drawings to design and colour.
name: Erica Durance

quote: I feel at home when I go to London.
name: Didier Drogba

quote: I look at my time on this earth as social anthropology, at home and in work life.
name: Joanna Coles

quote: I don't know how to sit outside myself and test against a hypothetical self who stayed home.
name: Thom Gunn

quote: Home is not where you live, but where they understand you.
name: Christian Morgenstern

quote: I'm not a meek lady who stays at home and cooks.
name: Diane Hendricks

quote: Dearest TV media and vans outside my home, please do not stress and work so hard.
name: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: The fellow that owns his own home is always just coming out of a hardware store.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing.
name: Jill Scott

quote: Home life ceases to be free and beautiful as soon as it is founded on borrowing and debt.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Home is the place we love best and grumble the most.
name: Billy Sunday

quote: Home, nowadays, is a place where part of the family waits till the rest of the family brings the car back.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: Fairly cheap home computing was what changed my life.
name: Linus Torvalds

quote: Music is always on. Not at work. But at home, everything always has to have a soundtrack.
name: Jose Andres

quote: The spirit is at home, if not entirely satisfied, in America.
name: Allan Bloom

quote: It's nice to have some continuity you can come back to. I feel that in coming home, coming back to London.
name: Felicity Jones

quote: Most days, I go home and I feel rejuvenated. I feel ebullient.
name: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quote: There is something permanent, and something extremely profound, in owning a home.
name: Kenny Guinn

quote: I'm going to buy some green bananas because by the time I get home they'll be ripe.
name: Ryan Stiles

quote: When I go home, its an easy way to be grounded. You learn to realize what truly matters.
name: Tony Stewart

quote: I de-stress with my family, just at home pruning roses, cutting, working in the garden.
name: Jaclyn Smith

quote: Home is the most popular, and will be the most enduring of all earthly establishments.
name: Channing Pollock

quote: Home life's great, man. The kids are great, happy and healthy. I've reached this sort of wonderful precipice.
name: Ryan Phillippe

quote: I did candles because I wanted a candle to put in my home. I couldn't find one I liked.
name: Matthew Williamson

quote: I grew up in a household where everybody lived at the top of his lungs.
name: Frank Langella

quote: I would not change my blest estate for all the world calls good or great.
name: Isaac Watts

quote: Home interprets heaven. Home is heaven for beginners.
name: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quote: Run a home like you would a small business and treat it with the same seriousness.
name: Anthea Turner

quote: I'm a real Suzy Homemaker.
name: Suzy Bogguss

quote: My parents have always been very supportive. I didn't go to school because my home was my school.
name: Clara Mamet

quote: I'm confident being at Universal, which is a great home for me, 'cause they understand what I'm trying to do.
name: Pras Michel

quote: Home wasn't built in a day.
name: Jane Sherwood Ace
